original: Welcome to the city of NEO EXUYAN
zh_trans: 欢迎来到Neo Exuyan市

original: There is a deadly invisible gas in this city, it seems dangerous, move quickly!
zh_trans: 城市中有一种无形的致命气体，似乎非常危险。我们应该尽快撤离！

original: The gas has turned some of our squad into ZOMBIES
zh_trans: 这些毒气将我们的一些小队成员变成了丧尸

original: Our mission cannot fail, we must keep moving!
zh_trans: 我们的任务不能失败，我们必须前进！

original: This gate will open soon, hold this bridge!
zh_trans: 大门很快打开，守住这座桥！

original: Call the elevator, we can hack the console over there to make it faster
zh_trans: 我们可以黑入终端让电梯来的快一点

original: *** VAL. VE MEGACORP HAS BLESSED YOU WITH INCREDIBLE HACKING SKILLS ***
zh_trans: *** VAL. VE MEGACORP 为你提供令人难以置信的黑客技术 ***

original: *** TIME REDUCED BY 10 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 时间缩减到10秒钟 ***

original: Elevator has been called, hold here!
zh_trans: 电梯已经呼叫，坚守阵地！

original: Hold the upper walkway, the door should open soon
zh_trans: 守住上层走廊，门应该很快开启！

original: Exit door opens soon, hold them off here
zh_trans: 出口大门很快打开了，将僵尸们拦在这！

original: Some of you must split off into the vents, maybe we can open the door from there!
zh_trans: 你们中的一些人需要分开，进入通风管道。或许我们能从那里打开这扇门。

original: It should regroup us after this door...
zh_trans: 在这扇门后重新集合

original: We got it! Door should open soon
zh_trans: OK，我们做到了！门应该很快打开

original: This should lead us into the parking lot, and into the greater downtown district!
zh_trans: 这会引导我们进入停车场，然后进入市中心！

original: The sewers should be right behind this door
zh_trans: 下水道应该就在这扇门的后面

original: Exit door ahead of us should open soon, resist!
zh_trans: 我们前方的出口很快打开，坚持住！

original: This small side door should take us into a maintenance area
zh_trans: 这个小侧门应该会让我们进入维修区

original: Another door? Hold a bit longer!
zh_trans: 另一扇门？再坚持一会

original: The next door seems to be jammed, perhaps we can open it faster?
zh_trans: 下一扇门好像被卡住了，或许我们可以让它开得快些？

original: That's it! Door should be opening soon!
zh_trans: 就是这样！门很快打开！

original: The canals! Neo-Kowloon should be close by
zh_trans: 运河！新九龙应该在这附近

original: The back entrance to Neo-Kowloon! Resist until it opens
zh_trans: 这是新九龙的后门！坚持到门开！

original: There is a high concentration of toxic-gas here, move quickly!
zh_trans: 这里毒气浓度很高，走快点！

original: The navigation algorithm is scrambled in here, we must keep moving
zh_trans: 导航算法在这里收到了干扰，我们必须前进

original: The exit should be on our left, climb through the wires!
zh_trans: 出口应该在你们的左边，爬过电线就行了！

original: The bridge across the canals should open shortly
zh_trans: 运河桥梁很快就能打开了

original: The bridge's exit doors should be opening soon
zh_trans: 桥梁出口很快开启

original: A maintenance door! Perhaps we can reach the Prey Plaza from here?
zh_trans: 维修门！或许我们可以从这里抵达Prey广场？

original: This long walkway should take us up to the side entrance of Prey Plaza
zh_trans: 这条长长的人行道应该会把我们带到Prey广场的侧门

original: Hold this wide walkway! The door will open soon
zh_trans: 守住这条宽人行道！门很快打开

original: The gate should open soon!
zh_trans: 大门很快打开！

original: The Bar should open shortly, resist!
zh_trans: 酒吧应该很快打开，坚持住！

original: We have to hold both entrances to the bar! We cannot let them it at any cost!
zh_trans: 我们必须守住酒吧的两个入口！我们必须不惜一切代价守住这两个入口！

original: Back room is opening soon
zh_trans: 后面的房间很快打开！

original: The bar's exit hatch should be opening shortly, this should lead us to the upper walkway!
zh_trans: 酒吧的出口应该很快打开。这应该会让我们抵达更高的走廊！

original: Be careful about these side-doors, they look like shortcuts!
zh_trans: 小心这些侧门，他们似乎是僵尸侧路

original: A-ha! This vent! It should take us back outside
zh_trans: 啊哈！这个通风管道，会把我们带到外边！

original: The upper walkway door should open soon
zh_trans: 上层走廊的门很快打开

original: Watch out the for that vent! It's looking a bit suspicious
zh_trans: 小心那个通风口，看上去非常可疑……

original: The second upper walkway door should open soon
zh_trans: 第二个上层走廊的大门很快打开

original: The door should open shortly, this should take to the Apartment Complex
zh_trans: 这扇门很快打开，这应该会把我们带到Complex公寓

original: The Apartment Complex should be ahead, past this maintenance corridor!
zh_trans: 公寓楼就在前面，穿过这条维修走廊！

original: The elevator has been called, it should arrive shortly
zh_trans: 电梯已经呼叫，应该很快抵达

original: This... isn't the correct floor?
zh_trans: 啊这……楼层不对吗？

original: WATCH OUT! HOLD THE ELEVATOR!
zh_trans: 小心！！！守住电梯！！！

original: This floor is the right floor, but be careful of more zombies from the same side!
zh_trans: 这一层才是正确的楼层，但是小心更多僵尸从同一面袭来！

original: The doors behind us are opening! Get out quickly!
zh_trans: 我们后面的门正在打开！快出去！

original: We need to enter this apartment to reach the rooftop outside
zh_trans: 我们需要进入这个公寓才能抵达外边的屋顶

original: Hold this room! This should lead us directly into the Industrial Sector
zh_trans: 守住这个房间！这应该会把我们带到工业区

original: We have no time to visit the lab, but we can use these corridors to reach the Industrial Sector
zh_trans: 我们没有时间去探访实验室了，但是我们可以利用这些走廊抵达工业区

original: Crossing this walkway should help us, resist until the door opens!
zh_trans: 穿过这条人行道可以帮助我们，守到门开！

original: Keep holding them off! We're nearly at our destination
zh_trans: 继续拖住他们！！我们距离目的地已经很近了！

original: These doors will take a long time to open, hold 'em off!
zh_trans: 这些门可能需要点时间来打开，拖住他们！

original: A skilled hacker may be able to reduce the timer using that console!
zh_trans: 熟练的黑客或许能黑入终端让门开得更早些

original: *** TIME REDUCED BY 15 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 时间缩减了十五秒 ***

original: The glass doors will open soon! Be careful of those big metal doors!
zh_trans: 这扇玻璃门很快打开！小心那些金属大门！

original: Destroy the generator! It's hooked up to that locked glass door!
zh_trans: 摧毁发电机！这和那扇锁住的玻璃门有关系！

original: Generator has exploded! The doors should open soon
zh_trans: 发电机已经被破坏！门很快打开！

original: We are nearly at the Railway Control Room, keep it up!
zh_trans: 我们已经靠近铁路控制中心，坚持住！

original: Maintenance corridoors should lead us to the control room!
zh_trans: 维修走廊可以带我们到控制室！

original: The control room! We need to hack the console to call the train! Defend the hacker!
zh_trans: 控制室！我们需要黑入终端来呼叫火车！保护黑客！

original: The last door before the tracks should open very soon! HOLD IT!
zh_trans: 轨道前的最后一扇门很快打开，守住！

original: The trains are leaving for the Upper-Echelon District! JUMP ON!!!
zh_trans: 火车正在离开Upper-Echelon区！跳到火车上！

original: TO BE CONTINUED IN PART 2
zh_trans: 后续将在第2部

original: 牛哥哪里懂敌托邦，还是大伙更懂
检测到五香牛肉粉存活，自动开启核爆程序
B站关注274009-五香牛肉粉，得牛哥自用二手新菲寄呗
遵从牛之盟约，吾在此召唤牛哥，夜之牛神！被漆黑的火焰吞噬殆尽吧被漆黑的火焰围绕的人啊 和我漆黑火焰使缔结王道的契约吧 眼 眼睛 在与之产生共鸣！
